items.text_for_match: Bournemouth sign defenders Milosavljevic & Jimenez Bournemouth sign teenage central defender Veljko Milosavljevic for £13m from Serbian side Red Star Belgrade and take full-back Alex Jimenez on loan from AC Milan. Bournemouth sign teenage central defender Veljko Milosavljevic for £13m from Serbian side Red Star Belgrade and take full-back Alex Jimenez on loan from AC Milan.

items.ja: Liverpool's £125m man Isak 'forever grateful' to Newcastle
items.en: Liverpool's £125m man Isak 'forever grateful' to Newcastle
items.text_for_match: Liverpool's £125m man Isak 'forever grateful' to Newcastle Alexander Isak says it was "an honour" to play for Newcastle as he thanks the club's supporters in a farewell message following his move to Liverpool. Alexander Isak says it was "an honour" to play for Newcastle as he thanks the club's supporters in a farewell message following his move to Liverpool.

items.ja: Highlights: Leverkusen draw prompts Ten Hag sacking
items.en: Highlights: Leverkusen draw prompts Ten Hag sacking
items.text_for_match: Highlights: Leverkusen draw prompts Ten Hag sacking Erik ten Hag is sacked by Bayer Levekusen after his side let slip a two-goal lead against Werder Bremen to draw 3-3 in only his second Bundesliga game in charge. Erik ten Hag is sacked by Bayer Levekusen after his side let slip a two-goal lead against Werder Bremen to draw 3-3 in only his second Bundesliga game in charge.

items.ja: How Premier League great Ederson changed goalkeeping
items.en: How Premier League great Ederson changed goalkeeping
items.text_for_match: How Premier League great Ederson changed goalkeeping Gary Lineker, Ian Wright and Alan Shearer explain why Brazilian Ederson is one of the Premier League's top 10 goalkeepers of all time, as he leaves Manchester City for Fenerbahce after eight years. items.ja: 'A sour taste' - inside a summer like no other in Newcastle's history
items.en: 'A sour taste' - inside a summer like no other in Newcastle's history
items.text_for_match: 'A sour taste' - inside a summer like no other in Newcastle's history Newcastle United have had a breathless end to the transfer window after the club agreed to sell Alexander Isak and struck a deal to sign Yoane Wissa. Newcastle United have had a breathless end to the transfer window after the club agreed to sell Alexander Isak and struck a deal to sign Yoane Wissa.

items.ja: The player power fallout: 'Despicable' stars or 'hypocritical' clubs?
items.en: The player power fallout: 'Despicable' stars or 'hypocritical' clubs?
items.text_for_match: The player power fallout: 'Despicable' stars or 'hypocritical' clubs? After Alexander Isak and Yoane Wissa both forced moves with their behaviour, will we see an increase in players doing the same? And is it ever defensible? After Alexander Isak and Yoane Wissa both forced moves with their behaviour, will we see an increase in players doing the same? And is it ever defensible?
